title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.1 - Torches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1153.1 - Torches

State Regulations

No person shall operate an oxy-acetylene torch, electric arc
or similar flame or spark producing device on any part of a terminal except in
areas within leased premises specifically designated for such use by the
manager, without first obtaining a cutting and welding permit from the
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1153.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
